title: Radical Index
text: What is the index of the radical?

title: Even radical index
text: Since the radical index is $$2$$, it is even, so, the radicand must be greater than or equal to $$0$$.

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Subtract $$8$$ from both sides of the inequality which gives $$-x$$ is less than and equal to $$-8$$.

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Divide both sides of the inequality by -1and get $$x$$ is less than equal to $$8$$. We can turn it into interval notation as $$(-\infty,8]$$.
